name: Nordic Financial Unions
membership:
Finance Watch: www.finance-watch.org
UNI Europa Finance: www.uniglobalunion.org
goal: Nordic Financial Unions (NFU) is an organisation for co-operation between trade unions that organise employees in the banking, finance and insurance sectors in the five Nordic countries. At present, seven trade unions are affiliated to the NFU; two in Denmark, one in Finland, two in Sweden, and one in each Iceland and Norway. Through these trade unions, NFU represents 150 000 employees in the Nordic financial markets.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market
euInitiatives: Capital Markets Union, retail financial services, IMD 2,Mifid 2,, Long-term financing and level 2 activties by the European Supervisory Authorities.
